name: Ninja Tactics: Season of Undead
description:
I made a game with zombies in it, and a ninja. No stealth. All action.

Threw this together in 10 hours. Focused on the juice. Wear headphones.

Don't get bit. Blow Stuff Up.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Mouse - Aim/Shoot
  • Q/E - Change Weapons

Follow Devlogs for this and our first commercial game, Infinite Loop, here and join our discord here!

Main Theme: Ninja16 - Die (freemusicarchive.org Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 License.)
